Teen Titans: Trouble in Tokyo

Ano: 2006

IMDb ID: tt0816671

Classificação: 7

Sinopse: America's coolest heroes Teen Titans head to Japan as they spring into action when a new threat, the dichromatic ninja Saico-Tek, appears in their city. A chase across the city ensues, ending at Titans Tower. Saico-Tek is interrogated by Robin with the aid of a translation program, and reveals the identity of the one who sent him. The ninja then escapes his bonds and vanishes after destroying a fire sprinkler, and the Titans' only lead is to search for his mysterious master - the shadowy figure known as Brushogun.—Anthony Pereyra {hypersonic91@yahoo.com}
